calendar.title: **Stack · Detail** __type Calendar__
calendar.stackDescription:
Even on busy days,
quickly check your schedule.
calendar.detailDescription:
Routes, times, schedules—
all detailed at a glance.

code.title:
Enter **flight number** or **3-letter code**
to register your schedule.
code.searchPlaceholder: Search airport code or flight number

friends.title: **Connect with colleagues and friends**
friends.description:
Share schedules with friends and check **days off (OFF)** together
all at once.

memo.title: **Things to pack before flight, don't miss anything**
memo.description:
From briefings, service changes, to personal memos,
record and check everything by schedule.
